file_content.text: Didn't see you at the mess hall last night. You missed out on some good eating.
Boy, those Ortolans know how to cook. They made this tauntaun stew... ooh!
I'll stick with my field rations, thanks.
I hear they're preparing something special tomorrow. Don't know how you make a wampa taste good, but if anyone can do it....
Hey, I figure after all the troops they've been munching on, it'll be nice to finally return the favor.
